attributes.action: Bring Au Pair Pocket Money in Line with Germany, France and the rest of Europe.
attributes.additional_details:
The astronomical increase in au pair pocket money - from 90 GBP per week to 360 GBP per week - is unrealistic, especially compared to our EU counterparts. The government's mandate means that au pairs earn more than qualified nannies and even nurses, as au pairs receive fullboard (all bills inclusive) thereby putting their monthly earnings in real terms around 3000 GBP.

This mandate means only the rich can afford au pairs. It also worsens the childcare crisis in Britain and should be reversed.
attributes.background:
Acknowledge the real cost of au pairs to families and bring the au pair pocket money inline with the rest of our European neighbours, as per below:

UK 1586 GBP
Germany 280 EUR
France 350 EUR
Belgium 450 EUR
Italy 300 EUR
Netherlands 340 EUR

Source: www.aupairworld.com/en/wiki/pocket-money

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

In the UK, au pairs are entitled to the minimum wage.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

For example, if you wish, you could start a new petition calling for au pairs to be exempt from the minimum wage and remunerated with pocket money only, if accommodation is provided.
